lyrics.text:
Ko hotau Hala ‘a Sīsū
Ki hotau ‘Otua
‘Oku mo’ui fai ma’u pē,
Pea ta’engata.

Ko e Mo’oni ‘a Sīsū,
Ta’e ha’ane hala,
Ko e Mo’ui pē ia,
Fakalaumālie.

Ko e hoko’anga ia,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Ki he kakai houhau’ia,
Pea loto feinga.

Ko e Hala ‘oku papa,
Talu mei mu’a,
Ki he kau fakatomala,
Pea manavahē.

Ko e Hala ‘ata’atā
Pea taki tonu;
Ki hotau mālōlō’anga,
Ko Hēvani ia.
